title: Gene Abundance

log2_ratio.description: Average log-ratio of sample reporter-ion to common reference of peptide ions associated with the gene in acquisitions from a specific biological sample.

precursor_area.description: Total precursor area of peptide ions associated with the gene in acquisitions from a specific biological sample.

unshared_log2_ratio.description: Average log-ratio of sample reporter-ion to common reference of peptide ions of unshared peptides only associated with the gene in acquisitions from a specific biological sample.

unshared_precursor_area.description: Total precursor area of peptide ions of unshared peptides only associated with the gene in acquisitions from a specific biological sample.

description:
Derived results intended to approximate protein abundance for a given
gene product. Units of measurement include peptide-spectrum-matches (spectral
counts), precursor or reporter ion abundance.

links.label: Gene Abundance references measurements for a Gene.
links.name: Gene

links.label: Gene Abundance references the Study it is derived from.
links.name: Study

links.label:
Gene Abundance references an experimental run of the Study it is derived
from.
links.name: Study Run Metadata
